slogan: Professional image processing solution, providing efficient image compression, format conversion, and cloud storage services to help you easily manage image resources.
settings.description: Manage the application settings and preferences.
general.description: Manage the general application settings and preferences.
compression.description: Support for JPG, PNG, WebP, AVIF, and other formats, providing efficient image compression to reduce file size while maintaining image quality.
conversion.description: Support for JPG, PNG, WebP, AVIF, and other formats, providing efficient image conversion to meet different image format needs.
oss.description: Integrate Amazon S3 object storage service, providing secure and reliable cloud storage solutions, supporting image upload, management, and distribution.
settings.compression.title: Compression
settings.compression.description: Manage the compression settings and preferences.
settings.compression.tinypng_api_keys.de: <tinypng>Tinypng</tinypng> is a tool that helps you compress images. You can click <here>here</here> to get your api key.
settings.compression.tinypng_api_keys.fo: Add a new API key to the system.
settings.compression.task_config.title: Task Config
settings.compression.task_config.descrip: Manage the task configuration and preferences for image compression.
settings.compression.task_config.concurr: The maximum number of concurrent image compression tasks.
The mode of saving the compressed image to the file system after compression.
The suffix of the new file name is added to the original file name, for example: the original file name is test.jpg, the suffix is _compressed, then the new file name is test_compressed.jpg.
The target folder path for saving the compressed image.
settings.compression.task_config.metadat: Whether to retain the metadata of the image during compression.
